name: VRC Hub
description: The VRC Hub app is the ideal competition companion for teams, spectators, and event planners involved in the VEX Robotics Competition!  - Become an expert with a searchable, easy-to-use official game manual - Ensure you always have the latest rules with in-app alerts - Keep score at home with an intuitive calculator for the current game - Use the included timer to run your own practice matches (featuring official sounds!)
